mapper.select: SELECT m.*, r.rating FROM market m left join (SELECT marketNum, round(AVG(rating),1) as rating FROM review GROUP BY marketNum) r ON (m.num = r.marketNum) WHERE address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' ORDER BY m.userNum
SELECT m.*, r.rating FROM market m left join (SELECT marketNum, round(AVG(rating),1) as rating FROM review GROUP BY marketNum) r ON (m.num = r.marketNum) ORDER BY m.num DESC

SELECT m.*, r.rating FROM market m left join (SELECT marketNum, round(AVG(rating),1) as rating FROM review GROUP BY marketNum) r ON (m.num = r.marketNum) WHERE marketName LIKE '%' || #{marketName} || '%' ORDER BY m.userNum
mapper.insert: insert into market values(#{num},#{userNum},#{categoryNum},#{crn},#{marketName}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openTime},#{closeTime},1,1,#{marketIntro},#{thumbImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, sysdate, null)
mapper.update: update market set deleteAt = sysdate where userNum=#{userNum}
UPDATE market SET address=#{address} WHERE userNum=#{userNum}
update market set openTime=#{openTime},closeTime=#{closeTime},categoryNum=#{categoryNum},marketName=#{marketName},marketIntro=#{marketIntro},thumbImg=#{thumbImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where num=#{num}
update market set isOpen=#{isOpen} where UserNum=#{userNum}
